title: function returns None
extract: Functions without a return statement known as void functions return None from the function. ... If we get to the end of any function and we have not explicitly executed any return statement, Python automatically returns the value None.Dec 7, 2017
extract_html: Functions without a return statement known as void functions return None from the function. ... If we get to the end of any function and we have not explicitly executed any return statement, Python automatically returns the value None.Dec 7, 2017
